column1: The First Hall of Moria was on the eastern side of the Misty Mountains
column2: above the Dimrill Dale and apparently the first hall built by Durin I.  The Great Gates of Moria led right into the First Hall
column3: and from this space there was a wide passage and stairs leading to the Bridge of Khazad-dûm
column5: and the rest of the city.  In contrast to much of Khazad-dûm
column6: the First Hall was brightly lit due to high windows on the eastern side.  After the fall of Gandalf
column7: the remaining members of the Fellowship of the Ring ran through the First Hall to escape from Moria on January 15 .
